text: Siham̐taka lagatē ārau yibōra janapadara mājata āmi barakata dichilō, sē'ibōrara madhyarartī sthānata āmi dr̥śyamāna bahutō janapada sthāpana karaichilō ārau sē'ibōra janapadata bhramaṇara bābē yathāyatha byarasthā karaichilō. Kaichilō, ‘tōmālōkē ē'ibōra janapadata dinē-raāti (yētiẏā icchā tētiẏā'i) niraāpadē bhramaṇa karaā’
